episodes.name: Judgment
episodes.overview: Angel protects a pregnant woman being hunted down demons after he inadvertently slays her guardian.

episodes.name: Are You Now or Have You Ever Been
episodes.overview: In the 1950s, Angel aids a woman hiding from her past inside a hotel with a long history of death and mayhem. Meanwhile, in the present day, Angel and his colleagues hunt down a demon responsible for the carnage.

episodes.name: First Impressions
episodes.overview: Angel encounters an amorous Darla in his dreams; Cordelia vows to protect Gunn after she experiences a vision depicting him in mortal danger.

episodes.name: Untouched
episodes.overview: Angel attempts to help a girl with telekinetic powers before she falls into the hands of Wolfram and Hart.

episodes.name: Dear Boy
episodes.overview: Darla attempts to drive Angel over the edge in hopes of getting him to embrace his dark side.

episodes.name: Guise Will Be Guise
episodes.overview: Angel meets with a swami in hopes of ending his obsession with Darla; meanwhile, Wesley assumes Angel's identity and plays bodyguard to a wealthy business man's daughter.

episodes.name: Darla
episodes.overview: Lindsey finds himself drawn to Darla as her mental state deteriorates.

episodes.name: The Shroud of Rahmon
episodes.overview: Angel goes undercover with the help of the witty and street smart Gunn in order to prevent a mind-altering shroud from falling into the wrong hands.

episodes.name: The Trial
episodes.overview: Still haunted by flashbacks of his 150-year fling with the dreaded Darla, Angel sends Gunn out to find her.

episodes.name: Reunion
episodes.overview: The newly revamped deadly duo of Drusilla and Darla hit the streets of L.A. Angel is frantic, searching for the terrible twosome.

episodes.name: Redefinition
episodes.overview: Angel takes on Darla and Drusilla as they hold try-outs for people who want to wreak havoc.

episodes.name: Blood Money
episodes.overview: Angel threatens to reveal Wolfram and Hart's criminal activities when he discovers they're stealing large contributions being made to a teen shelter. However, someone from Angel's past has other plans for him.

episodes.name: Happy Anniversary
episodes.overview: Angel and The Host search for a physicist who, with the aid of to Lubber demons, plans to freeze time so the he and his girlfriend will live in eternal happiness. Meanwhile, Wesley, Cordelia and Gunn start their first official case.

episodes.name: The Thin Dead Line
episodes.overview: Angel teams up with Kate to investigate the rumours of "dead" renegade police who are out for blood. Cordelia, Wesley and Gunn carry out their own investigation that results in Wesley being seriously wounded by a police gunshot.

episodes.name: Reprise
episodes.overview: Wolfram and Hart's senior partner is coming to visit. When Angel learns that the "senior partner" is actually an evil and merciless demon from hell, he must sacrifice his own life to destroy the powerful beast.

episodes.name: Epiphany
episodes.overview: After an empty night of passion with Darla, Angel wakes up with his soul still intact and has an epiphany. Angel tries to reunite with his former employees,but Cordelia, Wesley and Gunn are reluctant to forgive him, even when their lives are at stake.

episodes.name: Disharmony
episodes.overview: While the group tries to track down a cult of vampires with a wicked scheme, Cordelia gets a surprise visit from her high school friend Harmony. Unaware that Harmony is now a vampire, Cordelia invites her to join the team on a mission.

episodes.name: Dead End
episodes.overview: Cordelia's visions get worse and the gang fears for her health. Meanwhile Lindsey is granted a new hand that has a murderous mind of its own.

episodes.name: Belonging
episodes.overview: Angel and his crew must find a way to kill a bloodthirsty demon who has arrived in town from another dimension through a mysterious, magical portal. Meanwhile, Cordelia discovers a whole new world.

episodes.name: Over the Rainbow
episodes.overview: Cordelia is sucked through a magic portal  and transported into a demon dimension where humans are considered inferior and sold into slavery. When Angel, Gunn, Wesley and the Host jump through the portal in search of her, they are attacked by an angry mob of villagers.

episodes.name: Through the Looking Glass
episodes.overview: Angel, Gunn, Wesley and the Host are sentenced to death by the villagers. They are brought before the princess of Pylea, who they are shocked to discover is Her Royal Highness Cordelia. Soon, Cordelia discovers one of her duties as princess is mating with a creature called the Groossalugg.

episodes.name: There's No Place Like Plrtz Glrb
episodes.overview: Angel struggles with the inner beast the demon dimension brings out in him, while Wesley and Gunn join with rebel forces to overthrow the government and Her Majesty. It's up to Cordelia to save the Host him while Angel seeks help to rescue everyone and return home.

name: Season 2
overview: The second season of the television series Angel, the spin-off of Buffy the Vampire Slayer, premiered on September 26, 2000 on The WB and concluded its 22-episode season on May 22, 2001. It maintained its previous timeslot, airing Tuesdays at 9:00 pm ET, following Buffy.
